mapper.select: select usetable.email,userinfo.phone,userinfo.name,userinfo.department,time,timed,uses,systemType,configuration,temPort,domainName from usetable,userinfo where state=0 and usetable.email=userinfo.email
mapper.update: update usetable set reason=#{reason},state=#{state} where email=#{email} and state=0 and systemType=#{systemType} and uses=#{uses}
